    • Method Detail

      • verifyToken

        boolean verifyToken(java.lang.String authToken,
                    java.lang.String username)
        checks to see if the given auth token provided by a user is valid or not
        Parameters:
        authToken - the current provided auth token
        username - the username of the user trying to access the database
        Returns:
        true or false whether or not that user currently uses that auth token

      • addToken

        void addToken(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String username)
       throws TokenAlreadyExistsException
        adds the passed token to the user's list of valid tokens
        Parameters:
        token - the token to add to database
        username - the username of the user to which to add the token
        Throws:
        TokenAlreadyExistsException - when the passed token already exists associated with the user specified

      • clearTokens

        void clearTokens(User user)
          throws UserNotFoundException
        clears the tokens of the given user
        Parameters:
        user - the user for whom to delete all auth tokens
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user passed does not exist in the database

      • clearTokens

        void clearTokens(java.lang.String username)
          throws UserNotFoundException
        removes all tokens from the user with the given username
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user for whom to delete all tokens
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the username is not associated with any user
